name: Hello Friend!
description:
Just a short chill game about total strangers getting to know each other through a cute and simple chat app ~

[NotA, he/him, 25]

“Is really not a f♡♡k boy!”

A good guy, always here to lend you an ear for your rants or a shoulder for your tears. A bit dense at times though, and often misunderstood about his intentions because of his good looks and forward personality.

[PetiteJill1234, she/her, 24] 

“Let’s gush together☆”

Authoritarian and sarcastic at first, she is actually rather open minded and a true fangirl. She isn’t good at socializing, a bit clumsy and shy, but a loyal friend to those who don’t mind these aspects of her personality.

[EBNO, he/they, 27]

“We don’t talk about EBNO no no no…”

Probably the most calm and reasonable of the lot. Was a small streamer for a really short time then quit and switched activities to become a game dev…
Or rather, trying to be one.
He might play games more than creating them.
